titleStmt.title: Die Lunae, 3⁰ April, 1643 a letter from Sir John Hotham from Hull, of the first of this April instant, expressing Sir Hugh Cholmley's deserting the Parliament ...

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first three lines of text.
Title from Wing (2nd ed.): Resolutions for an impeachment of Sir Hugh Cholmley.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiqaries (London, England).
